mapper.select: select a.*, b.nick from product_info a, user_info b where a.user_idx = b.user_idx and a.p_flag != 9 and p_idx = #{p_idx}
select * from product_info where p_flag != 9 order by p_idx desc
mapper.update: update product_info set p_flag = 9 where p_idx = #{p_idx}
mapper.select: select * from product_info where p_flag != 9 and (p_name like '%'||#{parameter}||'%' or p_contents like '%'||#{parameter}||'%') order by p_idx desc
select p.* from (select p_idx , count(*) cnt from wishlist_info group by p_idx order by cnt desc, p_idx desc) w inner join product_info p on w.p_idx = p.p_idx where p.p_flag != 9 and rownum <= 3
select * from (select * from product_info where p_flag != 9 order by p_idx desc) where rownum <= 3
select a.*, b.nick from product_info a, user_info b where a.user_idx = b.user_idx
